frontmatter.title: Python cheatsheet
frontmatter.description: Python cheatsheet. I.E. setting up a provisionary HTTP Server.

items.prismified: import socket HOSTNAME = socket.gethostname() print(HOSTNAME)
help(TheClassObject)
items.txt: Get help for a Class object

items.code:
import json

with open('/path/to/file.json', "r") as f:
    file_contents = json.loads( f.read() )
    print( json.dumps(file_contents, indent=4) )
items.prismified: import json with open('/path/to/file.json', "r") as f: file_contents = json.loads( f.read() ) print( json.dumps(file_contents, indent=4) )

items.code:
with open('/path/to/file.txt', "w") as f:
    f.write( "A string, dumped JSON or the like" )

import os variable = os.environ['some_variable_name']

items.code: import subprocess subprocess.Popen("script2.sh", shell=True) #Note: *os.system("script2.sh") is not recommended*
items.prismified: import subprocess subprocess.Popen("script2.sh", shell=True) #Note: *<code>os.system("script2.sh")</code> is not recommended*
